title: Triazolam-induced brief episodes of secondary mania in a depressed patient.
abst: Large doses of triazolam repeatedly induced brief episodes of mania in a depressed elderly woman. Features of organic mental disorder (delirium) were not present. Manic excitement was coincident with the duration of action of triazolam. The possible contribution of the triazolo group to changes in affective status is discussed.
title_plus_abst: Triazolam-induced brief episodes of secondary mania in a depressed patient. Large doses of triazolam repeatedly induced brief episodes of mania in a depressed elderly woman. The possible contribution of the triazolo group to changes in affective status is discussed.

The possible contribution of the triazolo group to changes in affective status is discussed.
